description: From swimming (“(adj.) moving in water as an ordinary means of motion; without difficulty”) +‎ -ly (suffix forming adverbs from adjectives).

adverbs.description: swimmingly (comparative more swimmingly, superlative most swimmingly)

entries.meaning: With a gliding motion suggesting swimming.
(figuratively, informal) In a very favourable manner; without difficulty; agreeably, successfully.
examples: Synonyms: like clockwork, smoothly, without a hitch
